title: 2018 Ram 2500 ProMaster Van

Note: Application for Replacement Title, Transfer Form, and Court Order will be mailed once the court order is received. Please allow 2-3 weeks after removal. Thank you for your patience. The Bidder shall not bid on behalf of another individual; the Bidder/Purchaser/DMV Registrant must be the same. The Buyer is fully responsible for all aspects of smog, registration, transfer, taxes, and fees due to the DMV.
